name: Camera Fallowing
description:
Camera Fallowing is a randomly generated platformer.

Your goal is to stay on screen as long as possible.

You can play with a friend on the same keyboard on multiplayer mode.

This game was made for Game Boy Jam 5.

Also features!

Pixels

A cute squish thing

Sound

Four colors

Spelling errors

Is a game

Can run on windows computer

Update:

I fixed the a small bug where sometimes the camera would stop. (hopefully)

Thanks NiethR for pointing out that bug.
